tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE electric_bus_routing (
  route_id INT,
  route_name VARCHAR(50),
  distance_km FLOAT,
  traffic_pattern TEXT,
  demand_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE ElectricBuses (
    bus_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bus_name VARCHAR(255),
    route_id INT,
    current_location GEOGRAPHY,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
	traffic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	bus_route_id INT,
	traffic_street VARCHAR(50),
	traffic_intensity INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (bus_route_id) REFERENCES bus_routes(bus_route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE bus_demand (
	demand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	bus_route_id INT,
	demand_date DATE,
	demand_count INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (bus_route_id) REFERENCES bus_routes(bus_route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BusStops (
  stop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stop_name VARCHAR(50),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
)

CREATE TABLE RouteSchedules (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  stop_id INT,
  departure_time TIME,
  arrival_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE TrafficPatterns (
  pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  traffic_level VARCHAR(10),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  congestion_index INT
)

CREATE TABLE BusRoutes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_stop_id INT,
  end_stop_id INT
)
